<WG1492> And Seeing <WG1161> <WG3588> Matters <WG2962> Her <WG846> That <WG3754> Was Gone <WG1831> The <WG3588> Hope <WG1680> <WG3588> Of Gain, <WG2039> Their <WG846> Having Taken Hold Of <WG1949> <WG3588> Paul <WG3972> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Silas <WG4609> They Dragged Them <WG1670> Into <WG1519> The <WG3588> Market <WG58> Before <WG1909> The <WG3588> Magistrates; <WG758>
